Detailed Description

Note Class Interface.

Author:
Carlos Eduardo Mello
Date:
3/5/2009
This file describes the interface for MuM's Note Class. Notes are used in MuM to represent discrete sonic events (MuNotes) which are contained by music material objects (MuMaterial), organized in voices (MuVoice) and modified by the material's methods.

Definition at line 37 of file MuNote.h.

const short OCTAVE_OFFSET = 3

difference in octaves between MIDI and Csound formats

This is used to convert between MIDI and Csound pitch formats.

CS-OCTAVE = ( MIDI-VALUE / ONE_OCTAVE ) + OCTAVE_OFFSET

CS-PITCH-CLASS = MIDI-VALUE % ONE_OCTAVE

Definition at line 51 of file MuNote.h.

const short ONE_OCTAVE = 12

One octave defined as 12 half-steps.
